fields.name: Rent:
fields.value:
- Base: $35
- 1 Shelf: $100
- 2 Shelves: $135
- 3 Shelves: $180
- 4 Shelves: $245
- 5 Shelves: $410

Shelves cost $180 each.

fields.name: Product:
fields.value:
- When you use Smartphone, you may use the online delivery service to choose any unowned Walmart Property to buy immediately, if you have the money or the Gift Card to do so. Alternatively, you may sell the Smartphone to the Bank for $35.
- If you're the Owner, you may sell it at the current Rent price, or you may use it once per Turn to order a Shelf at a 50% discount.
